title: Avengers the Origin
description: The true story of the Avengers is revealed right here! This five-issue extravaganza reveals previously untold details of the historic fi rst meeting of Thor, Iron Man, the Hulk, Ant-Man and the Wasp! You only THINK you know the full story. From Joe Casey (AVENGERS: EARTH'S MIGHTIEST HEROES) and artist extraordinare Phil Noto! AVENGERS MOVIE PREMIERES SUMMER 2012! COLLECTING: Avengers: The Origin #1-5
author: Joe Casey
